nodes.text: Syngia was a planet in the galaxy, located in the Sertar sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Syngia was also where the ancient Sith Lord Remulus Dreypa practiced his mastery over the creation of life, and where he left behind his mysterious Genesis pool.

Mutated creatures, descended from those created by Sith alchemy, lived on the planet. Grand Master Yoda of the Jedi Order was aware of these beasts, and warned other Jedi of their existence through a notation in his copy of The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force.
